Name: Coding
Description: Everyday I strive to learn more. My first programs were in highschool starting with java and Object-Oriented Programming. Now, I am comfortable with frontend and backend development. During my career, I have also done some embedded development  with c++. In the Spring of 2019 I graduated with my B.S. in Computer Science.

Name: Computer
Description: Through countless hours of reading, building and taking apart I continue to learn the inner workings of computer hardware. I have built my own PCs and continue to learn by building my own minature network with multiple raspbery pis and other IoT devices.

Name: Quadcopter
Description: I build quadcopters as a hobby. It is a very addictive hobby being able to fly so fast (at speeds greater than 70 mph) and be so agile. If you have not tried it, I recommend checking out 'FPV Quadcopters' and if you are anything like me you'll be amazed.

Name: 3D Printing
Description: One of my many hobbies is 3D printing. 3D Printing allow me to make my own parts for Quadcopters and other devices I construct. I also annoy my Wife with high electric bills and plastic parts everywhere.
